title-of-article: A Castiglioni monographic exhibition La Triennale di Milano, Milan / Event information / / Sony
content:
Lampadina: Film reel turns to turn the power on. Then a famous video footage of Antonelli and Castiglioni is played on screen.

 Sella: The phone moves interactively following the stool’s movement as if someone is sitting and talking on the phone.

 Toio: Based on ideas of car head lamp combined with a fishing rod, two movies run one after another - one related to driving a car and the other fishing.

 Mezzadro: As in the name Mezzadro (tractor stool), strong vibration and country side scenery on the peeping window give you a feel as if “riding on the track”.
